items.title: Web3 Community
items.text: Web3 community starters do not need to hold an initial token sale. Finding the sweet spot between supply and demand in cryptocurrency pricing is challenging, given the undeniable psychological implications. However, this is not necessary for a web3 community starter to succeed. Instead, they can focus on building a strong community and generating cash flow for the treasury. By doing this, they can create a sustainable and long-term business model.

items.title: KOL Fans Club
items.text: No-code development allows key opinion leaders (KOLs) to quickly and affordably onboard their followers to a Web3 community. By using tokenomics to build a sustainable subscription model, creators and communities can benefit from growth. This is a significant departure from the Web2 model, in which platforms control the majority of the value.

items.title: SBT Pricing
items.text: Soulbound Projects (SBTs) are non-transferable Projects that represent a person's identity in Web3. Since SBTs do not have market liquidity, they cannot be priced using traditional methods, such as order books or liquidity pools. However, SBTs can be priced using bonding curves, which are mathematical functions that define the relationship between the price of a token and the amount of Projects that are available.

items.title: What is the bonding curve ?
items.text: A bonding curve is a mathematical formula that defines the relationship between the supply and price of a token. It is a decentralized way to buy and sell Projects without the need for an exchange. Bonding curves are often used in DeFi projects to allow users to buy and sell Projects directly from the project's treasury.

items.title: What does a bonding curve bring to a Web3 project and its community?
items.text:
Bonding curves are a decentralized and transparent way to distribute Projects. They allow anyone to buy Projects directly from the project's treasury, rather than through a centralized exchange. This helps to ensure that Projects are distributed more efficiently and fairly, as whales with large holdings cannot control the price.

Bonding curves also provide a way for investors to buy Projects at a fixed price. This protects them from volatility in the market and encourages them to buy Projects early. This can help to build a strong community around the project and increase its chances of success.
